name: Spider-Man
text: Spider-Sense — Interrupt: When the villain initiates and attack against you, draw 1 card.

flavor: "Right now, I'd trade the whole Spider-Man bit for a rocking chair and a good book."
name: Peter Parker
text: Scientist — Resource: Generate a [mental] resource. (Limit once per round.)

flavor: "I'm not a hero, I'm a thief."
name: Black Cat
text: Forced Response: After you play Black Cat, discard the top 2 cards of your deck. Add each card with a printed [mental] resource discarded this way to your hand.

flavor: "Have you been training? 'Cause that almost hit me." -- Spider-Man
name: Backflip
text: Interrupt (defense): When you would take any amount of damage from an attack, prevent all of that damage.

name: Enhanced Spider-Sense
text: Hero Interrupt: When a treachery card is revealed from the encounter deck, cancel its "When Revealed" effects.

name: Swinging Web Kick
text: Hero Attack (attack): Deal 8 damage to an enemy.

flavor: "Goodness, Peter! You've been so clumsy lately."
name: Aunt May
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Aunt May → heal 4 damage from Peter Parker.

name: Spider-Tracer
text: Attach to a minion. Forced Interrupt: When attached minion is defeated, remove 3 threat from a scheme.

name: Web-Shooter
text: Uses (3 web counters). (Enters play with 3 counters. When those are gone, discard this card) Hero Resource: Exhaust Web-Shooter and remove 1 web counter from it → generate a [wild] resource.

name: Webbed Up
text: Hero form only. Attach to an enemy. Max 1 per enemy. Forced Interrupt: When attached enemy would attack, discard Webbed Up instead. Then, stun that enemy.

name: Captain Marvel
text: Rechannel — Action: Spend a [energy] resource and heal 1 damage from Captain Marvel → draw 1 card. (Limit once per round.)

flavor: "It's my job to protect the Earth and everyone on it."
name: Carol Danvers
text: Commander — Action: Choose a player to draw 1 card. (Limit once per round.)

flavor: "This is what I wanted: helping the innocents by hospitalizing the guilty."
name: Spider-Woman
text: Response: After Spider-Woman enters play, confuse the villain.

flavor: "This is one of the more impressive messes I've ever seen." -- Carol Danvers
name: Crisis Interdiction
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 2 threat from a scheme. Then, if you have the [[Aerial]] trait, remove 2 threat from a different scheme.

name: Photonic Blast
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to an enemy. If you paid for this card using a [energy] resource, draw 1 card.

flavor: This low-orbit space station can beam cargo and crew to and from the Trikalion
name: Alpha Flight Station
text: Action: Exhaust Alpha Flight Station, choose and discard 1 card from your hand → draw 1 card (draw 2 cards instead if you are Carol Danvers).

name: Captain Marvel's Helmet
text: Captain Marvel gets +1 DEF (+2 DEF instead if you have the [[Aerial]] trait).

name: Cosmic Flight
text: Captain Marvel gains the [[Aerial]] trait. Hero Interrupt (defense): When Captain Marvel would take damage, discard Cosmic Flight → prevent 3 of that damage.

name: Energy Channel
text: Max 1 per player. Action: Spend X [energy] resources → put X energy counters here. Hero Action (attack): Discard Energy Channel → deal 2 damage to an enemy (to a maximum of 10) for each energy counter here.

name: Business Problems
text: Give to the Tony Stark player. You may flip to your alter-ego form. Choose: - Exhaust Tony Stark → remove Business Problems from the game. - Exhaust each upgrade you control. Discard this obligation.

name: Affairs of State
text: Give to the T'Challa player. You may flip to your alter-ego form. Choose: - Exhaust T'Challa → remove Affairs of State from the game. - Choose and discard a [[Black Panther]] upgrade you control. Discard this obligation.
